content.description: Crux is around the 3rd or 4th clip up. Little to no feet at that height.
content.protection: 6 qickdraws and then two anchors at he top.
content.location: Looking at the third trestle and the river, it is the furthest route to the right of the main face.

content.description: Definitely going to need to use either the left or right arete.Â
content.protection: 6 bolts to double top anchor with rap rings.
content.location: looking at the trestles and the river it is on the right side of the third trestle.

content.description: Climb the side of the trestle staying off the arete. The crux for me was after the second bolt. Also, if you fell before the second bolt, I think you could deck, hence the PG13 rating.
content.protection: 5 bolts to 2 bolt anchor with rap rings
content.location: Facing trestle 3 from the river, it's on the right side.

content.description: This last trestle is across the river. Unfortunately, since this trestle sees so little activity, the side facing the river is currently completely overgrown on the lower portion. This makes Ravenous, Poison Ivy, and Beekeeper difficult to impossible to climb.
